attributes.additional_details: as above - stop council profiteering on working public to give benefits to those who refuse to work
attributes.background:
prohibit any form of work/parking levy because
1. this is THEFT
2. public transport is slow and unreliable 
3. risding cost of living /fuel, electricity, gas, inflation/

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In any case, it is up to employers - not the Government or Parliament - what parking facilities to provide for their staff.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
